channel.title: How do I fix Relleka Shirts (woven tops, etc)
channel.description:
Well, since this was a requested item for shops, I need to know how to fix the arms on woven tops and the shirts because the body is normal but you still see your normal clothes arms instead of it's.
this is what it looks like: [IMG]http://i169.photobucket.com/albums/u221/zer0z7/top.jpg[/img] This is what it's [i]supposed[/i] to look like: [IMG]http://i169.photobucket.com/albums/u221/zer0z7/fixedtop.png[/img] If you notice, the item goes into the right spot.. but it doesn't look right so ya o.o
Help from any greatly appreciated :)

item.title: How do I fix Relleka Shirts (woven tops, etc)
item.dc:creator: @Simply_Z3R0 Simply Z3R0
item.description:
@Simply_Z3R0 wrote:

Positive… ahh[br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2007, 01:18:19 AM[/size][hr]public static int platebody[] = {7392,7390,6065,5575,5024,5026,5028,5030,5032,5034,

just a short part with the shirt codes…

the 5024 - 5034 are them >_<

Also had the same problem with Doctors Gown.. I added it to platebodies it went to weapons - I added it to normal bodies and the sleeves were like that as well.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Simply_Z3R0 Simply Z3R0

@Simply_Z3R0 wrote:

They were in the bodies part so I moved to platebodies and now they appear as weapons.

edit: checked and checked, they are in platebodies for sure…

item.title: How do I fix Relleka Shirts (woven tops, etc)
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

That’s because those shirts and things are put as only ‘half’ tops, when they should be on as plate bodies. Find ‘public static int fullplatebodies’ in the item.java thing, and stick the ID for those things in there.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I fix Relleka Shirts (woven tops, etc)
